CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Draw with capacitive device
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Draw with a capacative device like a finger or soft-tipped stylus instead of just an active stylus.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Pressure Sensitivity
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: Set the stylus's pressure sensitivity - 0 is off and 100 is all the way on.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Zoom Threshold
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: Set the ammount zoom needs to change by before the zoom change is applied - 0 means pinch actions will zoom imediately, and 100 means the pinching fingers need to be twice as far apart as they started to zoom in
